amendment.description: An amendment numbered 43 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to eliminate funding for USDA's Rental Assistance Program.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the United States Department of Agriculture's Rental Assistance Program by $1,606,926,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 89 - 341 (Roll no. 412).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 89 - 341 (Roll no. 412).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
